verses.roman:
ei-mata gaura-prabhu prati dine-dine
vilāpa karena svarūpa-rāmānanda-sane

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; gaura-prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prati dine-dine—day after day; vilāpa karena—laments; svarūpa-rāmānanda-sane—in the company of Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī and Rāmānanda Rāya.
translation: Thus absorbed in transcendental pain, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu lamented day after day in the company of Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī and Rāmānanda Rāya.
